Articles.Content:
Hello to all,

i have a problem with my base on Minmus. i am trying to add a new part of the base, and when i dock it, the whole base starts to wobble and explodes.

Why is this happening? how can i fix it? I also tried to deploy the drills to make it more stable, with no result.

you can check the movie to have a clearer idea of what is happening : 

 

 

Thanks
